title: TheKinOfTheFreljord (TKTF) Recruiting! (ANY DIVISION). *BUMP*
body:
TKTF Are a Casual (blind pick) and Competitive Team made for all divisions

Ign:
Age:
Role:
Main Champ:
Division:
Reasons why you want to join:
Some other stuff like weaknesses:

Will take any roll mainly bcz i assume people really want adc :D

(Plz no add-erino)

Possible roster

replies.body:
IGN: Meanderzz
Age: 16
Role: ADC, Support
Mains: ADC - Sivir Support - Nautilus, Leona, Blitz
Division - Previously S5 but now finding it impossible to claw out of bronze :(
Reasons why you want to join: Very passionate and interested in the competitive scene. Also want to gain the experience and rewards of high level play, without having to deal with feeders, flamers and AFKs
Weaknesses: Not the best farmer in lane and hate playing with a very passive ADC, as i'm a super aggressive support

Ign: bapitixo
Age:23
Role:Support/adc
Main Champ: Thresh,Blitz,Leona,Nami,Sona (supports)..... Kalista,Vayne,jinx (adc's)
Division: d2 previously (account got hacked,  currently unranked)
Reasons why you want to join: To know what it feels to have 1, 2, 3 or more people that actually know how to play :P to be competitive with more than myself.. and to actually have some fun playing for once instead of being frustrated over the teammates i get.
Some other stuff like weaknesses: frustrated easily at scrubarinos... trusting people without first having synergy (enough games played to know what they will do)

Ign: Aerlion
Age: 23
Role: Jungle, Mid or ADC.
Main Champ: Kha'Zix, Sejuani and a few others (Jungle). Ahri, Ziggs and AD's (Mid). Jinx, Lucian, Caitlynn, Sivir and mostly all current meta champs (ADC).
Division: Silver 4, Hard to climb when you have to play Tank in Tank Meta...
Reasons why you want to join: I want a secure place to hopefully reach gold rewards without having to spend 24/7 trying to get out of silver.
Some other stuff like weaknesses: Not one of the greatest farmers in lane, Also lose track of where and when I'm supposed to Gank or Farm as a Jungler. I usually win trades in Mid and have great ganks that I sometimes get over aggressive with.

Ign: DiddlyDonger
Age: 17
Role: Sup
Main Champ: Leona/Morgana/Sona
Division: S1
Reasons why you want to join: Looking for a cool ranked team to join 
Some other stuff like weaknesses: When my adc plays passive

"Orangetato:
im 19, i play top & mid, my main champ is jarvan,
and i want to join just to play ranked 5's for fun because I enjoy it more than soloq " Ty for app, will be sure to read over  more :P

Ign: Adonkeyzoan
Age: 18
Role: Mid/Adc/Sup/Jungle
Main Champ: Anivia/Vayne/Thresh/Amumu
Division: P5
Reasons why you want to join: Teams are fun
Some other stuff like weaknesses: fizz and jungle ganks mid
